Reviews.Title: “Great Location, average rooms, terrible stairs”
Reviews.Author: lasheen7
Reviews.Content: hotel located center red light district close city center dam square central station average air condition tv clean bathroom stayed 6 persons friends value money typical european breakfast supposed free wifi wasnt biggest ve stairs tall luggage suffer thats recommended fro 3 days max

Reviews.Title: “Rudest staff in ALL my travels”
Reviews.Author: _Rachelle_The_Aussie Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: guessed grunt arrival bad choice 500 euros easter weekend didnt hello hard ladies counter rudest weve encountered access buzzing rarely wait press buzzer ourself security morning breakfast manager talk offers coffee tea informed prior arrival am allergic oj option couldnt water morning food left breakfast stale bread 2 pieces salami roomsbathrooms fine top redlight district inflated prices customer service ok easter egg plate

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: jaineee
Reviews.Content: ownersstaff lovely nice professional phone conversations emails stay extremely welcoming arrived hours check time offered breakfast wait lounge clean towels morning slept breakfast comment waiting day 1015 people breakfast okay leaving notice people visit discount card wasnt offered nice spacious clean tv carpet removed burned mind bring slippers double bed cosy nice firm mattress mattress protector bathroom amazing shower powerful hot water shower bath didnt soon bathroom toilet clean location close overall value money definitely recommend female travelling safe hotel buzz door leads

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location but you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: DanLuffly
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 83 september friends brilliant time amsterdam leave balanced review reviews left petrified location perfect location fab weekend dam plan drinks dancing clubs etc sophisticated base weekend dont stay clean fresh towels everyday beds comfy view canal basic yes matter seeing sights eating nice food drinking dont anyway hotel facilities fine shower towels beds wifi breakfast basic line stomach perfect staff fund guy reception fun dry sense humour agreed wonders people rude varied sense humour themselves perfect please dont reviews remember golden rule major city pay â£45 night dont expect ritz complain dont

Reviews.Title: “Reviews are misleading”
Reviews.Author: Mageegs82
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 people weekend hotel 83 worst stayed throughtout travelling experiences grotty run hopelessly furnished iron television etc bathroom 1950s hospital stairs stayed 3rd floor stairs actually vertigo steep understatement age range 2629 food breakfast consisted stale bread cheese amount meat fruit service absolutely appalling despite receiving confirmation 2 occassions twin booked confirmed told double arrival hotel laugh glorified hostel poor absolutely terrible

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Spenny_Paul
Reviews.Content: hotel exceeded expectations werent expecting low price paid 1 night stay bed breakfast location hotel superb heart red light district pubs bars basic clean decent beds 2 twin 1 quad quad own bathroom 2 twin shared showers spacious powerful toilet clean staff friendly helpful 3 morning discover bed sheets filthy covered hair reception changed bedding straight downsides stairs steep especially youve visited bars coffee shops breakfast disappointing cereal cheese ham orange juice food pull round hangover hotel short stay heart amsterdam definitely return

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, if you want to stay in the red light by the bulldog. We did and will be back in the New Year.”
Reviews.Author: fillymac
Reviews.Content: stayed dam plenty times victoria â£120 bed excellent location walk round red light dam sq damrak 5 minutes breakfast eggs sausage ham cheese breads wake call staff funny friendly bulldog middle bridges cool bar smoke pool sky sports cool music staff jan 2011

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for friends”

Reviews.Content: hotel value moneyyou middle red light district hotel famous pink elephant casa 2 mins walk herethe bit basic carpets worn expect person 3 nights 6 guys weekend weed enjoyed allthe basic bed shower toilet clean towels daily toilet shower shared apart breakfast quoted priceso looking mad time dam 100 times hostel pricei wouldnt girl romantic break mind takes woman amsterdam fun party yous enjoy

Reviews.Title: “very heart of the red light district”
Reviews.Author: jmepani
Reviews.Content: booked amsterdam flights 4 weeks pretty late deals hotels seen review trip advisor hotel 83 pics website triple basic met arrival beds broken owner replaced evening nearest metro 510min walk airport city compact getting basic nevertheless breakfast bread cheese ham teacoffee provided hotel basic clean bathroom newly renovated friendly helpful staff central location free wifi bad steep stairs reception lifts unique hotel loud light sleepers family friendly hotel due location main road red light district safe
